title: Job Portal as JobDuniya
description: JobDuniya is a comprehensive job portal built using React.js and Node.js. This project integrates various functionalities essential for a job search platform, including job listings, application tracking, user authentication, and profile management. With a sleek and user-friendly interface, JobDuniya aims to streamline the job search process for both job seekers and employers.

title: CRUD API
description: This project showcases a dynamic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) API built using Node.js and MySQL. It demonstrates efficient data manipulation and management techniques, providing a solid foundation for developing robust server-side applications. The project includes features such as endpoint handling, real-time updates, and seamless interaction with a MySQL database.

title: Socket Chat App
description: Socket Chat App is a real-time chat application developed using React.js. Leveraging the power of WebSockets, this app enables instant messaging and communication between users. The project features user authentication, multiple chat rooms, and a responsive design, providing an engaging and seamless chat experience.
